projects.name: LetsCode
projects.desc: A website with a functional C++ compiler that allows you to practice coding questions and submit your own, along with the ability to see the results in real time and a community chat option with a profanity filter

projects.name: SketchSphere
projects.desc: A multiuser Sketchboarding application where users can join a project using ProjectId and ProjectKey

projects.name: Stock Analysis Website
projects.desc: A stock analysis website I created that offers real-time data for equities listed on the BSE and NSE by using web scraping.

projects.name: Sorting Visualizer
projects.desc: A sorting visualizer that helps in visualizing sorting algorithms using bar graph and different colors. It has 5 different sorting algorithms: BUBBLE SORT, SELECTION SORT, INSERTION SORT, MERGE SORT, QUICK SORT

projects.name: Notes Taking App
projects.desc: A notes taking app with update and delete features. It also has pagination with a maximum number of notes per page being 6

projects.name: Morse Code Generator and Decoder
projects.desc: A website that uses REST API to generate and decode Morse code

projects.name: Git User Search
projects.desc: A website that helps in fetching user data from GitHub's REST API and displaying the data

projects.name: Librix
projects.desc: A library management system using QR-Code. It uses QR-Code for user verification, book issue, return, and all

projects.name: OS Scheduling algorithms visualizer
projects.desc: The OS Scheduling Algorithms Visualizer showcases FCFS, SJF, SRJF, and RR scheduling techniques, allowing users to interactively explore and compare process management and performance.

projects.name: OS Scheduling algorithms visualizer using C++
projects.desc: Developed an OS process scheduling visualizer using C++ that illustrates and compares FCFS, SJF, and Round Robin algorithms. The tool offers detailed output to enhance understanding of process scheduling concepts and performance metrics.

projects.name: QuickNest
projects.desc: This simple To-Do app allows users to create tasks with defined prioritiesâ€”low, normal, high, or critical. Tasks can be added, viewed, and categorized based on their urgency, providing an organized and intuitive way to manage daily responsibilities.

projects.name: TrueVoices
projects.desc: TrueVoices is a SaaS platform that enables businesses to collect authentic customer reviews and showcase them on their websites in customizable formats. It helps companies build trust and credibility by displaying real user testimonials, boosting engagement and conversions.

projects.name: MapRevo
projects.desc: MapRevo is a location-based review platform where users can explore, rate, and share feedback on various places. It features an interactive map for selecting locations and submitting reviews, allowing businesses and individuals to gather valuable insights and enhance decision-making.

projects.name: BudgetLens
projects.desc: Budget Lens is a financial planning tool designed to help users manage their budgets efficiently. It allows individuals and businesses to track expenses, set financial goals, and gain insights through intuitive dashboards, making budgeting simple and effective.

projects.name: Searching Algorithm Visualizer
projects.desc: A Searching Algorithm Visualizer that demonstrates key searching algorithms like Linear Search and Binary Search using dynamic visual aids. The tool provides step-by-step visualization of how each algorithm traverses and finds elements in arrays, making it easier to understand their mechanics and time complexities. Ideal for students and developers to interactively learn and compare search efficiency.
